title: Larsen & Toubro bags 'large' orders this quarter
description: The projects have been bagged by the power transmission and distribution business of L&T Construction, the company said in a BSE filing. As per company's classification, orders ranging between Rs 2,500 crore and Rs 5,000 crore fall in the category of large orders. In Saudi Arabia, it secured an order for turnkey construction of a substation with associated overhead transmission lines.
